titles.title: Nuclear Used Fuel Prize Act of 2008
To authorize the Secretary of Energy to establish monetary prizes for achievements in designing and proposing nuclear energy used fuel alternatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Science and Technology

bill.summary: 5/1/2008--Introduced. Nuclear Used Fuel Prize Act of 2008 - Instructs the Secretary of Energy to implement a program to award cash prizes competitively for research, development, demonstration, and commercial application of nuclear used fuel storage. Authorizes the Secretary to enter into an agreement with a private, nonprofit entity to administer the prize competition.
